home.aboutDesc: Young Achievers English Medium School is a newly established educational institution launched in 2025, located in Gram Patna Tamoli, District Panna. We provide a modern learning environment for children from Nursery to Class 8. Our philosophy is discipline, safety and concept-based education ‚Äî making quality English-medium learning accessible to every child in the region.

activity.desc: Hands-on learning through games, projects and classroom activities.

foundation.desc: English Medium education with deep focus on concept clarity and basics.

development.desc: Discipline, confidence building and personality development activities.

missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.subtitle: Values that shape every learner at Young Achievers
missionVision.missionDesc: To provide quality English-medium education with discipline, safety and concept-based learning. Our mission is to create confident children who grow in knowledge, values and skills.
missionVision.visionDesc: To become the most trusted school in the region by nurturing well-rounded students with strong academics, moral values and a lifelong love for learning.

journey.subtitle: How we are building excellence step by step

steps.desc: Sports, moral values, confidence building, communication and personality development.

hero.title: School Playground
hero.subtitle: Where learning meets fun, fitness and friendship. Our playground is designed to support physical growth, confidence and teamwork.

intro.title: A Healthy & Happy Play Environment
intro.p1: At Young Achievers, we believe outdoor play is an essential part of a child‚Äôs growth. Our playground supports physical fitness, confidence and social skills in a safe, joyful environment.
intro.p2: From Nursery to Class 8, students enjoy regular opportunities for outdoor games, sports activities and free play under supervision.

highlights.title: Playground Highlights
highlights.subtitle: Everything is designed for safety, fun and overall child development.

features.title: Safe & Secure Area
features.description: Playground is secured and supervised to ensure complete safety during playtime.

features.title: Age-Appropriate Equipment
features.description: Different play zones and equipment designed for Nursery, Primary and Middle School children.

features.title: Physical Fitness
features.description: Outdoor activities improve strength, coordination and overall health.

features.title: Teamwork & Discipline
features.description: Sports and group games build teamwork, leadership and discipline.

activities.title: Outdoor Activities We Offer
activities.subtitle: Activities are planned according to age group to ensure safety, enjoyment and skill development.

items.title: Nursery ‚Äì UKG
items.desc: Slides, swings, balancing games and safe free play

items.title: Class 1 ‚Äì 5
items.desc: Running games, basic sports and group activities

items.title: Class 6 ‚Äì 8
items.desc: Cricket, football, physical training and fitness exercises

finalCta.title: Let‚Äôs Build Strong & Active Learners
finalCta.subtitle: Give your child a balanced education with strong academics, discipline and physical fitness at Young Achievers English Medium School.

hero.title: Play & Learn Program
hero.subtitle: A joyful start where curiosity meets discovery. Our pre-primary wing focuses on learning through play to build confidence, creativity and strong foundation skills.

sectionTitle.title: Our Pre-Primary Pillars
sectionTitle.subtitle: Each module supports complete development ‚Äî sensory, visual, creative, language and social skills.

modules.title: Sensory Exploration
modules.description: Through clay modeling, sand play, and water activities, children explore different textures. This is essential for sensory processing and fine motor skill development.

modules.title: Visual Recognition
modules.description: Using colorful flashcards and 3D objects, we sharpen visual memory. Children learn to identify shapes, colors, and patterns in a fun, pressure-free way.

modules.title: Creative Expression
modules.description: Stories and puppet shows ignite imagination. We encourage children to express themselves through finger painting, drawing, and role-playing.

modules.title: Phonics & Language
modules.description: Rhymes, music, and phonics sounds help children recognize language patterns. This builds a strong foundation for future reading and speaking skills.

modules.title: Social Interaction
modules.description: Group games and shared activities teach children the importance of sharing, teamwork, and basic manners in a caring, social environment.

playAndLearn.note: Joyful, safe and pressure-free learning designed for toddlers.

finalCta.title: Start Your Child‚Äôs Journey Today
finalCta.subtitle: Enroll your little one in our Play-Way session. Explore learning modules, safe environment, discipline and strong foundation building.

hero.title: Primary Foundation
hero.subtitle: Nurturing young learners through a structured curriculum that builds strong basics, improves communication and develops logical thinking for future success.

pillars.title: Academic Pillars
pillars.subtitle: Our primary wing focuses on essential pillars that build strong academic growth, communication and confidence.

items.title: Core Foundation
items.description: In-depth focus on English, Math, and Science to build strong fundamental knowledge.

items.title: Critical Thinking
items.description: Moving beyond memorization to help students understand the 'How' and 'Why' of every topic.

items.title: Confident Expression
items.description: Daily reading and public speaking exercises to develop bilingual communication skills.

items.title: Hands-on Learning
items.description: Monthly projects and basic lab activities that make learning practical and engaging.

curriculum.title: Structured Curriculum
curriculum.subtitle: Subjects mapped to holistic cognitive development.

environment.title: Modern Learning Environment
environment.subtitle: We create disciplined classrooms where children learn with confidence, care and clarity.

points.d: Personalized attention ensures every child learns at the right pace.
Visual teaching & interactive digital tools for concept clarity.
Respectful environment where discipline is taught positively.
Small revision tests to improve memory, confidence and performance.

notice.title: Extra Support for Every Child
notice.desc: We help weak students with extra guidance and encourage bright students with advanced activities ‚Äî so everyone grows confidently.

finalCta.title: Secure Your Child‚Äôs Future Today
finalCta.subtitle: Registration is open for the new session for Classes 1 to 5. Give your child strong academics, discipline and confidence.

hero.title: Middle School Program
hero.subtitle: Strengthening academic concepts while building discipline, responsibility and analytical thinking ‚Äî preparing students for high school and future success.

core.title: Academic Core
core.subtitle: Middle School helps students transition from basic learning to mastery through discipline, depth and confidence.
core.note: Strong preparation for high school subjects & exams.

modules.title: Advanced Concepts
modules.description: In Middle School, we move beyond the basics. We focus on in-depth understanding of complex scientific theories and mathematical logic to prepare students for high school challenges.

modules.title: Academic Discipline
modules.description: We instill a sense of accountability and time management. Our structured environment ensures that students develop the focus and consistency required for lifelong success.

modules.title: Scientific Temper
modules.description: Students are encouraged to analyze data and perform structured experiments. We foster a mindset that questions 'why' and seeks evidence-based answers.

modules.title: Digital Leadership
modules.description: Moving from basic computer literacy to digital creation. Students learn to use technology for research, presentation, and fundamental coding logic.

modules.title: Character Building
modules.description: Beyond textbooks, we focus on communication skills and emotional intelligence. We aim to build responsible, ethical, and confident young leaders.

advantages.title: What Makes Middle School Strong?
advantages.subtitle: A balanced blend of academics, discipline and personality growth.

items.title: Regular Revision
items.desc: Weekly revision tests help students retain concepts and improve performance.

items.title: Concept Clarity
items.desc: Focus on understanding instead of rote memorization for long-term learning.

items.title: Competitive Mindset
items.desc: Students are trained to solve problems logically and confidently.

items.title: Communication Skills
items.desc: Reading, speaking, teamwork and leadership activities for personality development.

finalCta.title: Empower Your Child‚Äôs Future
finalCta.subtitle: Join the new academic session at Young Achievers. Middle School builds academic depth and leadership qualities.

hero.title: Our Classrooms
hero.subtitle: Safe, engaging and well-equipped learning spaces designed for confidence, discipline and concept-based learning.

structure.title: Classroom Structure
structure.subtitle: Every classroom is designed as per age group learning needs ‚Äî joyful learning for toddlers, strong basics for primary and concept mastery for middle school.

classrooms.title: Pre-Primary Classrooms (Nursery ‚Äì UKG)
classrooms.description: Our pre-primary classrooms are colorful, safe and activity-based. Designed to encourage curiosity, communication and early learning through play.

classrooms.title: Primary Classrooms (Class 1 ‚Äì 5)
classrooms.description: Primary classrooms focus on strong academic foundations with interactive teaching methods that make learning engaging and effective.

classrooms.title: Middle School Classrooms (Class 6 ‚Äì 8)
classrooms.description: Middle school classrooms encourage concept clarity, discipline and independent thinking to prepare students for higher education.

classroomsPage.note: Clean, disciplined and student-friendly classroom environment.

environment.title: Safe & Student-Friendly Environment
environment.subtitle: All classrooms are designed keeping student safety, comfort and effective learning in mind. We maintain a disciplined, clean and positive atmosphere for every child.

cards.title: Smart Teaching Aids
cards.desc: Digital & visual learning support for concept clarity.

cards.title: Clean & Hygienic
cards.desc: Daily cleanliness and hygiene standards maintained.

finalCta.title: Give Your Child the Best Learning Space
finalCta.subtitle: Enroll your child at Young Achievers English Medium School and experience safe classrooms, disciplined teaching and strong academic foundation.

hero.title: School Library
hero.subtitle: Building knowledge, imagination and curiosity through books. Our library helps children develop strong reading habits from an early age.

intro.title: A World of Books for Every Child
intro.p1: At Young Achievers, the library plays an important role in developing reading habits and expanding knowledge. Students from Nursery to Class 8 are encouraged to explore books beyond textbooks.
intro.p2: Our library provides a peaceful and well-organized environment where children can read, learn and build a lifelong love for books.

highlights.title: Library Highlights
highlights.subtitle: Everything is designed to build reading habit, focus and discipline.

features.title: Well-Stocked Library
features.description: Wide collection of story books, reference books and academic resources for all age groups.

features.title: Age-Wise Sections
features.description: Separate reading materials for Nursery, Primary and Middle school students.

features.title: Quiet & Disciplined Environment
features.description: A calm reading space that develops focus, concentration and discipline.

features.title: Reading Habit Development
features.description: Regular library periods encourage reading, curiosity and self-learning.

ageWise.title: Reading for Every Age Group
ageWise.subtitle: Library resources are selected as per reading level and learning needs.

cards.title: Nursery ‚Äì UKG
cards.desc: Picture books, rhyme books, story books and early reading materials.

cards.title: Class 1 ‚Äì 5
cards.desc: Story books, general knowledge books and subject-based basics.

cards.title: Class 6 ‚Äì 8
cards.desc: Reference books, novels, biographies and academic resources.

routine.title: Library Routine & Discipline
routine.subtitle: We maintain a calm environment and encourage every child to read regularly.

items.title: Weekly Library Period
items.desc: Every class gets regular library time to build strong reading habit.

items.title: Book Issue System
items.desc: Students can borrow books and return them within the set time.

items.title: Silence & Discipline
items.desc: A calm environment is maintained so every student can read peacefully.

items.title: Story & Reading Sessions
items.desc: Special sessions to improve listening, vocabulary and imagination.

finalCta.title: Let‚Äôs Build a Strong Reading Habit
finalCta.subtitle: A good reader becomes a confident learner. Join Young Achievers and help your child grow with books, knowledge and imagination.

faq.title: FAQs
faq.subtitle: Admission and school related common questions

items.q: Which classes are available for admission?
items.a: Admissions are open from Nursery to Class 8 with structured learning programs.
Yes, we provide English-medium education with focus on reading, writing and speaking.

items.q: What documents are required for admission?
items.a: Generally, Birth Certificate, Aadhaar (optional), previous report card (if applicable) and passport size photo.
Monday‚ÄìFriday: 8:00 AM ‚Äì 2:00 PM, Saturday: 8:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM, Sunday: Closed.
